contents.text: Welcome to 15Five, empowering your team’s performance and engagement through continuous feedback.
For support with 15Five features and account issues, please press 1.
For assistance with performance reviews, check-ins, and engagement surveys, press 1.
You’ve reached our performance and engagement support team; please hold and we’ll connect you to a specialist.

navigationGoals: Add custom questions to our performance review template for this quarter.
I need help structuring performance reviews and check-ins for my team
Help me customize our quarterly performance-review workflow and automate check-in reminders
I need help completing my year-end performance review and check-in form — I’m not sure how to rate my work.
I need help setting up and managing performance check-ins and engagement surveys for my lab team.

contents.text: For technical support including integrations and troubleshooting, press 2.
Our technical support team is here to help; please hold while we transfer your call.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my Slack integration so check-ins sync correctly.
I need assistance integrating 15Five with Slack for streamlined check-ins
Troubleshoot the OAuth integration failure between 15Five and our Jira instance
I can’t log into my account on my tablet and need assistance connecting 15Five to our Slack channel.
I’m having trouble with the Slack integration in my 15Five account and need technical support.

contents.text: To learn about our software, schedule a demo, or discuss pricing, please press 2.
To request a personalized demo of 15Five, press 1.
Thank you for your interest in a demo; please hold for a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized walkthrough of 15Five for my team.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to see how 15Five fits my team’s workflow
Schedule a technical walkthrough of 15Five’s dashboard and API capabilities
I’d like to schedule a personalized walkthrough of the 15Five platform so I can see how it works.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of 15Five to see how it can support our workflows.

contents.text: For questions about pricing, plans, and contracts, press 2.
Our sales team will be with you to discuss pricing and plans; please hold.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details and contract terms for the enterprise plan.
I want to understand pricing and plans for a small veteran-led team
Get a detailed breakdown of enterprise plan pricing and contract term options
Could someone explain the different subscription plans and pricing details to me?
I have questions about the different pricing tiers and contract terms for 15Five.
